# Why iPat? {-}
<p align="center"><img src = "../../md/icon.png" width = 200></p>

<center>**[iPat for Windows](http://zzlab.net/iPat/iPat.zip)**</center>

<center>**[iPat for Mac OS](http://zzlab.net/iPat/iPat_Installer.dmg)**</center>

<center>**[Demo data](http://zzlab.net/iPat/demo.zip)**</center>

<center>**[User manual (pdf)](http://zzlab.net/iPat/iPat_manual.pdf)**</center>

<br>
 Intelligent Prediction and Association Tool (iPat) is a software with a user-friendly graphical user interface (GUI). With iPat, GWAS or GS can be performed using a pointing device to simply drag and/or click on graphical elements to specify input data files, choose input parameters, and select analytical models. It not only makes users who feel more comfortable with GUI more flexible to do functional genomic studies in different statistical methods, but make the learning curve gradual for the first-time users.
